description: Sum of divisors of n read modulo (number of divisors of n).
links: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(n) = A000203(n) mod A000005(n), sigma(n) mod tau(n).
prog: (Haskell)import Data.List (genericIndex)a054025 n = genericIndex a054025_list (n-1)a054025_list = zipWith mod a000203_list a000005_list-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jul 28 2014, Jan 06 2012(PARI) vector(90, n, sigma(n) % numdiv(n)) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 15 2015
author: Asher Auel (asher.auel(AT)reed.edu), Jan 19 2000
